channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Footpath impassable, 21st December
item.description:
The footpath running along Frogfurlong ln is impassable. After the rain is muddy, bushes along the path are poorly maintained and makes it difficult even to walk. A proper pavement would help the use of the path, considering the possibility to make the track suitable for cycling would improve the street traffic safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frog Furlong Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 roadside drains appeared blocked in the area outside 15 Porchester Road. Leaves from trees by Wotton brook have caused blockages previously, gutters are rarely cleaned and perpetuate problem., 21st December
item.description:
From outside 9 Porchester road down to 23. Short, sharp shower caused flooding in photo.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynmouth Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are fallen trees (as many as 4) which are obstructing this path in Syreford Plantation., 21st December
item.description:
The fallen trees are in the woodland where I have placed the pin on your map. Passage is difficult for anybody who can't clamber through the trees.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Syreford Road, Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on slip road into Cudnall St from Cirencester Road, 21st December
item.description:
Multiple potholes on slip road into Cudnall St from Cirencester Road. Vehicles forced to go over potholes because of parking along this road, which also forces vehicles into oncoming traffic on a blind bend. Please fix the pot holes and add double yellow lines. Itâ€™s so dangerous!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langton Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement bollard has broken away from pavement, 21st December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Station Road, Bishop's Cleeve
